# 概率论与数理统计习题参考解答（西安邮电）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian
gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian
gailvlun-yu-shulitongji-xiti-cankao-jieda-xian-youdian <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
